annotations.description: This cocktail was created by Joaquin SÃ­mo at the bar Pouring Ribbons in New York City. He loving refers to this drink as a "Roast Chicken Dinner Drink" meani...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Dear Prudence

textContent:
1.5oz. (45ml) Vodka
.5oz. (15ml) Rose Lillet
.75oz. (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz. (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
.75oz. (22.5ml) Grapefruit Juice
1 Dash Peychaud's Bitters
3 Raspberries
Rasperry Flag Garnish

Shake and pour

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W7tvPGYnZRQ
title: Dear Prudence
